function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Industries producing essential health care products may still be at risk of infection spread due to close proximity of workers","Impact":"Potential outbreak in the manufacturing facilities leading to disruption of essential product supply","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures, provide personal protective equipment (PPE) to workers, and conduct regular testing and health screenings","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps for monitoring worker interactions, automated production processes to reduce human contact","People":"Factory workers, production line staff","Owner":"Company management, health and safety organizations"},{"Description":"Shipping problems and supply chain disruptions leading to revenue losses for vendors and small businesses","Impact":"Short-term revenue losses, inability to meet demand for essential products, financial instability for businesses","Mitigation":"Diversify supply chain, implement alternative shipping methods, prioritize essential product shipments","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics for demand forecasting, blockchain for transparent and secure shipping","People":"Vendors, small business owners","Owner":"Industry associations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Drastic reduction in air traffic due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Economic impact on airlines and related industries, reduced transportation options for essential goods and personnel","Mitigation":"Government subsidies for airlines, development of alternative transportation methods, strategic planning for essential goods transportation","Technologies":"Advanced aircraft maintenance systems, drone deliveries for essential goods, virtual reality training for airline personnel","People":"Airline employees, travelers, cargo transport personnel","Owner":"Airline companies, government aviation authorities"}]}
